name: Dirt Kid: In The Underworld
description:
Dirt Kid: In The Underworld is a story about fighting monsters and exploring a small world. 

GB Studio realizes a childhood dream of mine: Making my own gameboy games. 

Because this is the first game I've made with this software I decided it would be appropriate to take inspiration from the games I played as a child outside exploring parks and fields near my house. 

As a kid, my siblings, neighbors, and I would imagine fantasy worlds with monsters and creatures to fight and befriend. The story and characters in Dirt Kid are some of the stories and characters I imagined as a child. I think 10-year-old me would really like this game!
